## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] Linter checks pass (flake8)
- [ ] Security scan passes (bandit)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Security
- [ ] No sensitive information (passwords, keys, tokens) is committed
- [ ] Security vulnerabilities have been addressed
- [ ] Dependencies are up to date and have no known vulnerabilities

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation in docs/
- [ ] API documentation is updated if endpoints changed
- [ ] Environment variables are documented if added

### Deployment
- [ ] Database migrations are included if needed
- [ ] Configuration changes are documented
- [ ] Kubernetes manifests are updated if needed
- [ ] Docker images build successfully
